name: ErgometerJS
description: Java script ergometer driver for concept 2 performance monitor with BLE. (The PM5) Works on all major platforms using cordova and node/electron

scripts.build:copy_api: npm run build:copy_api_electron && npm run build:copy_api_electron_ts && npm run build:copy_api_cordova && npm run build:copy_api_cordova_ts
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:copy_api && npm run build:simplecordova && npm run build:simple_electron
